meanings.definition: A map or chart that uses photographs to show specific locations or features.
meanings.sent1: I used a photomap to find my way around the city.
meanings.sent2: The tourist relied on the photomap to explore the museum.
meanings.sent3: The photomap made it easy to spot all the hidden treasures in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a photomap of memories, each one a vivid snapshot of a moment in time.
meanings.sent5: The photomap was like a magical guide, revealing secrets of the ancient ruins.

meanings.definition: To create a map or chart using photographs.
meanings.sent1: She decided to photomap the entire coastline for her project.
meanings.sent2: The team will photomap the area to plan the new hiking trails.
meanings.sent3: He photomapped his room to remember where he left his keys.
meanings.sent4: Her words photomapped a journey of emotions, each one captured in a snapshot.
meanings.sent5: The artist photomapped the cityscape, creating a stunning visual representation.

meanings.definition: The act of using photographs to map out a location or area.
meanings.sent1: The photomap of the forest helped us navigate through the dense trees.
meanings.sent2: His detailed photomap of the neighborhood impressed everyone at the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The photomap party game had us laughing as we tried to guess the locations.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a photomap of love, each picture capturing a special moment.
meanings.sent5: The photomap of memories guided her through the past, each photo a marker of time.
